name: Project.99_1704
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 1 game.

[Space Romance] by Sun park, Jaewon Yoo, Jaehyun Yoo, Jooeun Hwang

Look, move, meet, and kiss.

There are 2 bots and they fell in love. They should meet to kiss each other! The bots can move by using other's sight. So game player should let both of bots keep looking through eyes each other while moving.
